FuncDef: This command clears ISA nat-group commands related statistics or removes all the subscribers that are associated with a specific nat-group member

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the NAT group ID to clear. Values-1 to 4.
Specifies to clear the NAT group ID s l2-aware subscribers.
Specifies to clear the NAT group ID s statistics.
Specifies to reset the resource peak values to the current resource measurements.
